title: My First Week at Efuye Gela
body: I built my first page using semantic HTML and styled it with Flexbox. I also learned how to write JavaScript functions to make my site interactive.

title: Discovering Git & GitHub
body: Using Git helped me track code changes, and GitHub made it easy to collaborate and share progress with my team.

title: Blog Feature with Fetch
body: This mini project taught me how to fetch data using the Fetch and display it as styled cards on the page.but not working
